summary: Comprehensive site review for Bible Lesson Planner - tested all major features including homepage, mobile menu, lesson generation, lesson view, curriculum, progress, pricing, contact, and authentication flows. All backend APIs passed (13/13 tests). UI/UX is polished with good spacing overall.

issues: Excessive blank space between content and footer - content is compact but leaves large gap above footer. Could benefit from additional content or reduced min-height.

action_items: Consider adding more content or reducing min-height on Team page to reduce blank space
context_for_next_testing_agent: Full site review completed. All major features working: homepage with dark mode and language selector, mobile menu with proper font sizes and X close button, pricing with promo banner and FAQ accordion, contact form, sign in/sign up, lesson generation wizard, lesson view with map/quiz tools, curriculum planner, progress tracker, resources library. Team page has some blank space issue.

homepage.notes: All sections load correctly - hero, stats, features, pricing preview, testimonials, CTA, footer

mobile_menu.notes: Font size is 18px (readable), X close button visible with w-6 h-6 icon, 13 navigation links

dark_mode.notes: Toggle works correctly, theme switches properly

language_selector.notes: EN/ES toggle works, UI text changes to Spanish

pricing_page.notes: Promo banner visible (EASTER SPECIAL 20% OFF), billing toggle works, Individual/Organization tabs work, FAQ accordion works

contact_form.notes: Form submits correctly, shows success message 'Message Sent!'

sign_in.notes: Login with test credentials redirects to /lessons successfully

sign_up.notes: Form has required fields (name, email, password)

lesson_generation.notes: Multi-step wizard works - Scripture selection, Audience settings, Customize options

lesson_view.notes: Full lesson content with sections, memory verse, materials checklist, tools (Scripture Lookup, Biblical Map, Quiz Generator, AI Supply List), export/print buttons

curriculum_planner.notes: Shows 2 plans with stats, New Curriculum button available

progress_tracker.notes: Shows completion stats, filter tabs work (All/Completed/In Progress/Not Started)

team_page.notes: Content displays but has excessive blank space before footer
